sentences.en: A child's awareness of being an individual grows in stages during the pre-school years.
sentences.cn: 孩子的个体意识在入学前的几年中逐渐增强。

sentences.en: A historical awareness also imparts a sense of continuity.
sentences.cn: 历史意识也显示了一种连贯性。

sentences.en: an awareness of the importance of eating a healthy diet
sentences.cn: 认识到健康饮食的重要性

sentences.en: Deep inside the awareness was stirring that something was about to happen.
sentences.cn: 内心深处隐隐感觉到有什么事即将发生。

sentences.en: Environmental awareness has increased over the years.
sentences.cn: 这些年来人们的环境意识增强了.

sentences.en: He introduced radio to the school to increase the children's awareness.
sentences.cn: 他在学校开通广播，以提高孩子们的警觉性。

sentences.en: He was tortured by an awareness of the equivocal nature of his position.
sentences.cn: 意识到自己的立场本身难以解释清楚，他备受折磨。

sentences.en: Health officials have tried to raise awareness (=  improve people’s knowledge  ) about AIDS.
sentences.cn: 卫生部官员努力提高人们对艾滋病的认识。

sentences.en: It is assumed that you are interested in achieving greater self-awareness.
sentences.cn: 假定大家都想变得更有自知之明。

sentences.en: The 1980s brought an awareness of green issues.
sentences.cn: 20世纪80年代人们开始意识到“绿色问题”。

sentences.en: The campaign is designed to increase public awareness of the issues.
sentences.cn: 这场运动旨在提高民众对这些问题的认识。

sentences.en: The children had this inbuilt awareness that not everyone was as lucky as they were.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子生来就意识到并非人人都像他们那么幸运。

sentences.en: The project should raise general awareness about bullying.
sentences.cn: 这个项目将会提高民众对恃强凌弱行径的认识。

sentences.en: There is a general awareness that smoking is harmful.
sentences.cn: 人们普遍认识到吸烟有害健康.

sentences.en: Using puffery to raise awareness of products is illegal.
sentences.cn: 使用鼓吹性广告来提升产品的知名度是不合法的。

sentences.en: We must try to get rid of our blindness and raise the level of our political awareness.
sentences.cn: 我们必须努力摆脱盲目性,提高我们的政治觉悟.

words.tran_cn: 意识到的；知道的；有…方面知识的；懂世故的

phrases.tran_cn: 品牌意识，商标意识；品牌知名度
全球意识；完整的意识，知觉

trans.tran_en: knowledge or understanding of a particular subject or situation
